body.p: The second page of the site creation wizard is the Initial Version page.
This wizard page includes the following options:

dlentry.dd: Each site configuration can have multiple versions. They are managed in the Site Versions page. This is useful if you plan to have multiple versions of the output (for example, future versions of published technical documentation or multiple article revisions). This Initial Version option specifies the starting version. In most cases (especially if you do not plan to have multiple versions), you can leave the initial version as 1.0, but you can change it if you want the starting version to be something different.

Use this option to specify the Base URL for your website (you can add additional URLs by clicking the Add button). The comments component will only appear on pages within the hierarchy of this base URL.
